description: The search for the blackmailer continues, with Akihisa, Yuuji and the others narrowing in on a suspect: Aiko Kudou. In order to confirm their hunch, the gang once again sets out to sneak a peek during bath time.

titles.title: Boku to Nozoki to Otoko no Yuujou Tsu!
Eu, Espiar E Amizade Entre Os Homens!
僕とのぞきと男の友情っ!
